attributes.action: We want to save our hospital in Dewsbury including Accident & Emergency
attributes.additional_details: Newspaper articles reported the sale of departments within the hospital & now Dewsbury & Huddersfield accident & emergency departments are also under threat.
attributes.background: People in our community feel very concerned about the threats to close various departments of our hospital. This would include A&E. We are miles away from the next hospital & this would have adverse affects for many of us.
